entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Flurries beginning late this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 this evening then light overnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 9 April 2023
